data.text: @JimWill_KAG @AntorMiha @KMichaelthe2nd You and I know it's not the appliances that have to go, it's the biden administration that has to go! So the want every citizen to go $70,000 into debt with a new car and all new home appliances in their home? Yea,right LOL!
@7e4501f170f6437 @AntorMiha @KMichaelthe2nd Yep, I forgot about that. It's the only electric appliance we have but gas water heaters have to go too.
@JimWill_KAG @AntorMiha @KMichaelthe2nd And let's not forget the water heater!
@7e4501f170f6437 @AntorMiha @KMichaelthe2nd Closer to $25K by the time you replace your gas cook stove/oven and your gas clothes dryer.

@AntorMiha @JimWill_KAG @KMichaelthe2nd Yea, he's full of shit! So he wants you to yank out your working heater to replace it with electric,and how much will that cost to retro fit your house with a whole new heating system and rewire your house,$10,000
@AntorMiha Yup, he's a stool pigeon, a gunnel bird, a puppet of the WEF. It won't happen because we're all too damn broke to put up with his BS anymore.
@KMichaelthe2nd I agree, but remember, Murphy is pushing so hard for windenergy, and also he has this long term plan to make our gas homes switch to electric(thatâ€™s 75% of NJ)
@AntorMiha @GovMurphy I hate @PhilMurphyNJ more than anyone I know, but even he can't be blamed for the price fuel. Gotta kick this one up to the next tier.
